title: Introduction to C Programming
description: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to the fundamentals of C programming language, including data types, control structures, functions, and memory management.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Explore the essential algorithms and data structures used in computer science, and learn algorithm design techniques to solve complex problems efficiently.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: Get acquainted with C++ programming and its applications in data structures and algorithms (DSA), covering concepts like classes, objects, and pointers.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Master the foundational data structures such as arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues, which are essential for efficient algorithm implementation.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Learn the principles of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) in Python, covering classes, inheritance, polymorphism, and encapsulation.

title: Software Engineering
description: Dive into the principles and practices of software engineering, including software development methodologies, project management, and quality assurance.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: Explore Amazon Web Services (AWS) and cloud computing concepts, including cloud infrastructure, services, and deployment strategies.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: Gain proficiency in MySQL, a popular relational database management system (RDBMS), covering database design, SQL queries, and administration.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Enhance your problem-solving skills with a focus on algorithmic thinking, coding challenges, and strategies to tackle complex programming problems.
